definition: any of various types of cabbage, to make off with belongings of others
details:
noun
- any of various types of cabbage
= synonyms: chou
- any of various cultivars of the genus Brassica oleracea grown for their edible leaves or flowers
= synonyms: cultivated cabbage
- informal terms for money
= synonyms: boodle
verb
- to make off with belongings of others
= example: to make off with belongings of others
= synonyms: pinch
